paragraphs.body: It is a widely accepted standard that should normally be followed by all editors.

paragraphs.body: There are several policies as to what type of pages can be created. Pages which fail to follow these policies will immediately face deletion.
paragraphs.text: There are several policies as to what type of pages can be created. Pages which fail to follow these policies will immediately face deletion.

paragraphs.body: Reasons for deletion include, but are not limited to, the following:
paragraphs.text: Reasons for deletion include, but are not limited to, the following:

paragraphs.body: Fan ficton is allowed on Avatar Wiki, but there are special rules that apply to creation of such pages. "Fanon" includes speculative articles and shipping articles. Please see ${link_0} before you begin writing any fanon.
paragraphs.text: Fan ficton is allowed on Avatar Wiki, but there are special rules that apply to creation of such pages. "Fanon" includes speculative articles and shipping articles. Please see this page before you begin writing any fanon.

paragraphs.body: For encyclopedia articles, to avoid a possible deletion, one should establish the notability of the article's subject. Continued attempts to create content that is later summarily deleted should be sanctioned.
paragraphs.text: For encyclopedia articles, to avoid a possible deletion, one should establish the notability of the article's subject. Continued attempts to create content that is later summarily deleted should be sanctioned.

paragraphs.body: Images lacking a proper ${link_0} and/or license will be flagged with the {{unknown}} template. The respective uploader will be notified with an automated warning message telling him what his image is missing and how to fix it. This template categorizes these images into the ${link_1} category during three days and after that it switches them over to the ${link_2} category. Once the three days deadline is exceeded, images are deleted on sight.
paragraphs.text: Images lacking a proper source and/or license will be flagged with the {{unknown}} template. The respective uploader will be notified with an automated warning message telling him what his image is missing and how to fix it. This template categorizes these images into the media with missing information category during three days and after that it switches them over to the candidates for speedy deletion category. Once the three days deadline is exceeded, images are deleted on sight.
